tool.name: AskOmics
tool.description: AskOmics, a visual SPARQL query builder
tool.command:
## ToDo: the key could be generated randomly export ASKO_load_url='http://localhost:6543' && export ASKOMICS_API_KEY='abcd' && export ASKO_files_dir='/tmp/askomics-ie' && export VIRT_Parameters_NumberOfBuffers='10000' && export VIRT_Parameters_MaxDirtyBuffers='6000' &&
mkdir -p /import && cp '$infile' /import/foo.bed &&
sed -i.bak 's@^/monitor_traffic.*@@g' /start.sh && bash /start.sh
tool.help: AskOmics is a visual SPARQL query interface supporting both intuitive data integration and querying while shielding the user from most of the technical difficulties underlying RDF and SPARQL.
